Package maze.routing

Class RouteFinder

java.lang.Object
maze.routing.RouteFinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class RouteFinder
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
RouteFinder attempts to find a route from entrance to exit of a maze. The state of the RouteFinder can be stepped through.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • getMaze

      public Maze getMaze()
      Gets the maze that the RouteFinder is finding a route for
      Returns:
      Returns the maze attribute

    • getRoute

      public java.util.List<Tile> getRoute()
      Gets the current route
      Returns:
      Returns the route attribute which is a list of Tile objects

    • isFinished

      public boolean isFinished()
      Checks if the route is complete
      Returns:
      Returns the finished attribute, true for finished and false otherwise

    • load

      public static RouteFinder load​(java.lang.String path) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Loads a RouteFinder object from a text file
      Parameters:
      path - : The full file path to the text file
      Returns:
      Returns the RouteFinder object that was loaded from the text file
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

    • save

      public void save​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.IOException
      Loads a RouteFinder object from a file
      Parameters:
      filename - : The name of the file and its path
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • step

      public boolean step() throws NoRouteFoundException
      Updates the stack (route). A call to this method should make exactly one move through the maze
      Returns:
      Returns true if the route is complete
      Throws:
      NoRouteFoundException - If there is no possible route to solve the maze

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Visualises the entire maze and route-solving state as a string
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      Returns a string that is a representation of the maze and the route-solving state
